events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as it does not fit properly and I would prefer to return it.
The request has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's mention of returning the jacket and requiring money back.
Assigning agent Sarah to handle the refund request related to the jacket purchased by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unworn and still folded in the original box it was shipped in.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process once you send the jacket back. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick reply and for sending the label. I appreciate the smooth process for the refund.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Upon receipt of the jacket, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm you were able to send the jacket back and to update you on your refund status.
Yes, I shipped it last week. Please let me know once the refund is processed.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 5 business days.
We would appreciate it if you could take a moment to complete a satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
I completed the survey and am happy with the service I received during the refund process. Thank you!
Thank you for your feedback. We are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
